subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are accepting your refinance debt request
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this lot will expire THIS EVENING):
$467,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
http://zdqrtx.com/
